full_description:
Thermaltake DistroCase 350P Mid Tower ATX Casing

The Thermaltake DistroCase 350P Mid Tower ATX Casing is an ATX Mid-tower chassis with four 5mm thick tempered glass windows that is Tt LCS certified. The DistroCase 350P is a versatile and one-of-a-kind open-frame mid-tower chassis. The case's body is built with its own water loop, a D5 pump, and 48 LEDs that work with TT RGB PLUS, NeonMaker Light Editing, and Motherboard RGB Software. As the chassis' primary body is comprised of SPCC and PMMA, the casing is a fully modular chassis with a distro plate. This variant is designed to work with RGB-capable motherboards from Asus, Gigabyte, MSI, and AsRock. The Casing is built with G1/4 inlets and outputs to accommodate the most common fittings, providing you a wide range of options when designing your liquid-cooled system. The Thermaltake DistroCase 350P Casing includes the TT RGB PLUS Software and the NeonMaker Light Editing Software via the APP. This enables customers to easily create lighting profiles that monitor fan performance, alter fan speeds, and customize lighting effects for all compatible devices using the TT RGB PLUS Software and an exclusive mobile app. On the dedicated control panel, you can drag the slider to choose the appropriate fan speed (RPM), or simply select default modes. On the top, there are two 3.0 USBs and two 2.0 USBs for direct access as needed. The DistroCaseTM 350P Mid Tower Chassis can accommodate an ATX motherboard, a CPU cooler with a maximum height of 130mm, two-way VGA placement of up to 320mm (with reservoir & radiator attached), a power supply with a maximum length of 200mm, and up to two 3.5" or six 2.5" HDDs. When it comes to cooling, this case's water loop is created differently than standard PC cases. The DistroCase 350P Mid Tower Casing is a fully modular chassis that features a distro plate as its primary body. This multi-purpose PC enclosure has its own water channels, reservoir, and several inlets and exits. A 280mm or 360mm radiator at the front and a 360mm radiator on the side are both possible. The DistroCase 350P Mid Tower Chassis makes it easier for users, gamers, and enthusiasts to construct water loops for the best user experience. Thermaltake DistroCase 350P Mid Tower ATX Casing has no warranty.

Thermaltake Level 20 Tempered Glass Edition Full-Tower Gaming Case

The Thermaltake Level 20 Tempered Glass Edition Full-Tower Gaming Case features an E-ATX full tower chassis with three tempered glass panes and three 140mm Riing Plus 14 RGB fans that come pre-installed. The Thermaltake Gaming Case features a ventilation-focused, trio-chamber design with tempered glass and a tool-less locking mechanism, quick transmission (USB Type-C and USB 3.0), TT Premium Gaming PCI-E 3.0 Riser Cable, and integration with cutting-edge' TT RGB PLUS software/voice-controlled with as well as three built-in Riing Plus 14 LED RGB Fans, two Lumi Plus LED Strips front and rear, and one Riing Plus Digital Controller. The Three Riing Plus 14 RGB Fans and two Lumi Plus LED Strips are incorporated in to improve airflow while lighting up Level 20 with 16.8 million distinctly beautiful illumination display colors. The Thermaltake tempered glass Full-Tower casing exclusive accreditation is only awarded to goods that meet the design and hardcore enthusiast standards that should be applied to a true LCS chassis. The Tt LCS certification was designed so that Thermaltake Full-Tower casing could identify which chassis have been tested to be best compatible with extreme liquid cooling systems, ensuring you get the highest performance from the best features and fitting. It has TT Premium is much more than a quality guarantee. Behind the name is a love of DIY and modding, as well as Thermaltake's case aim to be the most inventive company in the PC hardware market. The Thermaltake Level 20 case has TT RGB PLUS Ecosystem intelligent lighting solution for PCs that combines the most modern addressable LED lighting with Thermaltake's own TT RGB PLUS Software. The Thermaltake tempered glass Full-Tower Casing has aluminum panels developed by high-precision CNC digital cutting to assure chassis security while delivering a futuristic gaming spirit. To meet users' expectations, the bundled Thermaltake casing has TT Gaming PCI-E 3.0 Riser Cable features premium quality, ultra-high speed cable, and EMI shielding with a conductive polymer. The Thermaltake Casing Level 20 includes a USB Type-CTMI/O port with a 10G communication speed per port. There are also USB 3.0 I/O ports. The Thermaltake Level 20 Tempered Glass Edition Full-Tower RGB Gaming Case has no Warranty.
